snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic will play his French Open semi-final on Friday away from the main show court after organizers were forced to stage four semi-finals on the same day in the rain-ravaged grand slam tournament....
lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic will play his French Open semi-final on Friday away from the main show court after organizers were forced to stage four semi-finals on the same day in the rain-ravaged grand slam tournament.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic to Play French Open Semi Away From Main Show Court
headline.main: Djokovic to Play French Open Semi Away From Main Show Court
